display_long_description:
# CRAFT WITH THE ELEMENTS 🧪
With the use of your oldest invention, the **Pro-Craftinator**, you can combine **Atomic Blocks** to create a variety of things from a list of **76 recipes**. Things crafted from **Radioactive Blocks** become radioactive themselves.

[media]

# EXPERIMENT ON YOUR TEST SUBJECTS 💩
Uhh... remember that strange mutant "pet" you created in defiance of all natural laws? It's been **poopin'** Polonium all over the lab... what have you been **feeding** it?!

[media]

# MASTER THE ART OF NUCLEAR FISSION ☢️
By modding the number of Neutrons in your Atomic Blocks, you can trigger **Radioactive Decay Chains** and discover new Isotopes, sometimes even new Elements. Radioactive Blocks will shake and rattle before they decay.

[media]

# DISCOVER THE PERIODIC TABLE ✨
Some things can only be crafted using more exotic Atomic Blocks, so be sure to unlock all the Elements to gain access to new Craftable recipes! There are **118 Elements** and **900+ Isotopes**, most of them still waiting to be discovered.

[media]

# KEEP THE SHOW RUNNING 🚀
Word of your inventions is quickly spreading. Having the power to manipulate the atoms, it turns out, is a great way to fund your "science" research, which is why you've set up shop. Fulfil visitor requests to earn more resources!

[media]

# NO NEED TO BREAK A SWEAT 💦
Do you suffer from old age, laziness or both? Is your room too small for room-scale VR? With our brand new **telekinetic gloves** you can sit back and let your fingers do the magic! No more unintentionally punching your real walls and loved ones!

[media]

# CRAFT WITH THE ELEMENTS 🧪
With the use of your oldest invention, the **Pro-Craftinator**, you can combine **Atomic Blocks** to create a variety of things from a list of **76 recipes**. Things crafted from **Radioactive Blocks** become radioactive themselves.

# EXPERIMENT ON YOUR TEST SUBJECTS 💩
Uhh... remember that strange mutant "pet" you created in defiance of all natural laws? It's been **poopin'** Polonium all over the lab... what have you been **feeding** it?!

# MASTER THE ART OF NUCLEAR FISSION ☢️
By modding the number of Neutrons in your Atomic Blocks, you can trigger **Radioactive Decay Chains** and discover new Isotopes, sometimes even new Elements. Radioactive Blocks will shake and rattle before they decay.

# DISCOVER THE PERIODIC TABLE ✨
Some things can only be crafted using more exotic Atomic Blocks, so be sure to unlock all the Elements to gain access to new Craftable recipes! There are **118 Elements** and **900+ Isotopes**, most of them still waiting to be discovered.

# KEEP THE SHOW RUNNING 🚀
Word of your inventions is quickly spreading. Having the power to manipulate the atoms, it turns out, is a great way to fund your "science" research, which is why you've set up shop. Fulfil visitor requests to earn more resources!

# NO NEED TO BREAK A SWEAT 💦
Do you suffer from old age, laziness or both? Is your room too small for room-scale VR? With our brand new **telekinetic gloves** you can sit back and let your fingers do the magic! No more unintentionally punching your real walls and loved ones!
